name: azure-resource-explorer
title: Azure Resource Explorer
description: Search and explore Azure resources from Raycast
author: nnstt1

commands.name: search
commands.title: Search Azure Resources
commands.description: Search Azure resources and open in Azure Portal

preferences.name: azureCliPath
preferences.title: Azure CLI Path
preferences.description: Custom path to the Azure CLI executable (e.g., /opt/homebrew/bin/az). Leave empty to use default paths.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
